title: 小游戏群组服起床战争胜利给经验咋弄
author: ctl520
txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: wedfwsd
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 wedfwsd 于 2020-3-30 09:04 编辑 

可以考虑给予附魔之瓶。。
# Reward commands
# It is prerequisite that every command can be executed from the console (sender).
# These placeholder can be used in every command:
# {player} - the player for which the command will be executed
# {score} - the score of the player in the current game (ONLY WHEN STATISTICS ENABLED!)
rewards:
  # Enable rewards
  # type: boolean
  # Enables reward commands
  enabled: false
  #上面的改成true
  # Game win
  # type: List<string>
  # Commands which will be executed for every player which wins
  # possible placeholders: {player}, {score}
  # set the first command to "none", no commands will be executed
  player-win:
    - /example {player} 200
  #上面的改成给予经验

replies.author: JMBishark
replies.txt_content:
ctl520 发表于 2020-3-30 09:34
可是怎么执行命令玩家命令
/networklevels rewards | 打开奖励GUI
/networklevels stats | 查看你的记录
/networklevels stats <player> | 查看某玩家的记录
/networklevels about | 查看插件相关信息

管理员命令
/networklevels admin | 查看管理员命令
/networklevels reset <player> | 重置某玩家数据
/networklevels addxp <player> <数量> | 给玩家经验
/networklevels addrandomxp <player> <最小值> <最大值> | 给随机经验
/networklevels setxp <player> <数量> | 设置玩家的经验
/networklevels removexp <player> <数量> | 删除玩家的经验
/networklevels addlevel <player> <数量> | 给玩家等级
/networklevels setlevel <player> <数量> | 设置玩家等级
/networklevels removelevel <player> <数量> | 删除玩家等级
/networklevels reload | 重载插件
看看这些
在玩家游戏胜利时用这个就可以了
/networklevels addxp <player> <数量> | 给玩家经验
/networklevels addrandomxp <player> <最小值> <最大值> | 给随机经验
